title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 335: Featuring Grant Fuhr + Frankie Borrelli
description:
On Episode 335 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Grant Fuhr and Frankie Borrelli. Frankie joined (56:32) to talk about his Islanders, him vs Grinnelli, Sean Avery and more. The guys open the show talking Habs-Leafs and recapping the rest of Round 1, along with Round 2 previews. The guys are then joined by Grant Fuhr (1:41:27) to discuss his career, Wayne Gretzky, playing golf before Game 7 and more. The guys wrap up the show talking about Brooks vs Bryson, the Tampa Bay Lightning jersey policy, Chelsea winning the Champions League and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
